mapper.sql: id, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, delete_flag, PONumber, goods_id, in_qty, gs_sales_orders, `status`
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from `gs_ Sales_orders_in`
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into `gs_ Sales_orders_in` (id, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, delete_flag, PONumber, goods_id, in_qty, gs_sales_orders, `status`) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ponumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inQty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{gsSalesOrders,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:

update `gs_ Sales_orders_in` set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PONumber = #{ponumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, in_qty = #{inQty,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gs_sales_orders = #{gsSalesOrders,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT c.order_no as ponumber,b.CBPB08,a.in_qty,a.id,a.create_time,a.status FROM `gs_ Sales_orders_in` a LEFT JOIN CBPB b ON a.goods_id=b.CBPB01 LEFT JOIN `gs_ Sales_orders` as c on c.id=a.gs_sales_orders WHERE a.delete_flag=0
and a.PONumber like concat('%', #{ponumber}, '%')
and b.cbpb08 like concat('%', #{cbpb08}, '%')
and date_format(a.create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
order by a.create_time desc

select DISTINCT gs.order_no as orderNo, gs.order_date as orderDate,a.create_time,sj.price as price, a.gs_sales_orders as gsSalesOrders, a.goods_id as goodsId, ca.CBCA01 as cbca01,ca.CBCA08 as cbca08, sa.CBSA01 as cbsa01,sa.CBSA08 as cbsa08, wa.CBWA01 as cbwa01,wa.CBWA09 as cbwa09, ua.CAUA01 as caua01,ua.CAUA09 as caua09, pb.CBPB10 as cbpb10,pb.CBPB12 as cbpb12, pb.CBPB08 as cbpb08,la.CALA08 as cala08, a.in_qty as inQty,a.PONumber as ponumber, a.id as id from `gs_ Sales_orders_in` a LEFT JOIN `gs_ Sales_orders` gs on a.gs_sales_orders = gs.id LEFT JOIN CBSA sa on gs.supplier_id = sa.CBSA01 LEFT JOIN CAUA ua on gs.saler_id = ua.CAUA01 LEFT JOIN CBCA ca on gs.customer_id = ca.CBCA01 LEFT JOIN CBWA wa on gs.wh_id = wa.CBWA01 LEFT JOIN CBPB pb on a.goods_id = pb.CBPB01 LEFT JOIN CALA la on la.CALA01 = pb.CBPB10 LEFT JOIN gs_Sales_orders_details sj on sj.gs_Sales_orders=gs.id
where a.`status` = 0
and gs.order_no like concat('%', #{orderNo}, '%')
and a.id = #{id}
and date_format(a.create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
